Name: HMS Welshman
Badge: On a Field barry wavy of six white and blue, a dragon rampant Red, supporting in the paws a trident Gold.
Displacement:
2,650 long tons (2,693 t) standard
3,415 long tons (3,470 t) full load
Draught:
11 ft 3 in (3.43 m)
14 ft 9 in (4.50 m) full
Propulsion:
4 × Admiralty 3-drum water-tube boilers
Parsons geared steam turbines
2 shafts
72,000 shp (53,690 kW)
Speed:
39.75 knots (73.62 km/h; 45.74 mph)
38 kn (70 km/h; 44 mph) full
Range: 1,000 nmi (1,900 km) at 38 kn (70 km/h; 44 mph)
Armament:
6 × QF 4 in (100 mm) L/45 Mark XVI guns on twin mounts HA/LA Mk.XIX
4 × QF 2-pdr L/39 Mk.VIII on quadruple mount Mk.VII
8 × Vickers .50 machine guns on quadruple mount Mk.I (later up to 12 × 20 mm Oerlikons on single mounts P Mk.III or twin mounts Mk.V)
156 × naval mines
